channel.title: How Do I Make D Claw Spec?
channel.description: i need to make where it shows spec bar and 1 spec takes half of the bar with correct gfx :)

item.title: How Do I Make D Claw Spec?
item.dc:creator: @Phineas Phineas
item.description:
@Phineas wrote:

Find the models, that code alone is not going to work.

item.title: How Do I Make D Claw Spec?
item.dc:creator: @towriss towriss
item.description:
@towriss wrote:

[quote=“de dust89, post:2, topic:329913”]if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == #### && specialAmount > 49){ specialAtk(true, 25, 252, 2068); DCdown = 4; DCDamg = true; getHit(100); do i put this in client.java?? usingSpecial = true; }[/quote]

Read full topic
item.source: How Do I Make D Claw Spec?

item.title: How Do I Make D Claw Spec?
item.dc:creator: @Pure_Demons Pure Demons
item.description:
@Pure_Demons wrote:

[quote=“de dust89, post:2, topic:329913”]if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == #### && specialAmount > 49){ specialAtk(true, 25, 252, 2068); DCdown = 4; DCDamg = true; getHit(100); usingSpecial = true; }[/quote]

Either that or use the tutorial found in the models section with the Dclaws download.

Read full topic
item.source: How Do I Make D Claw Spec?
